item.title: 5 errors
item.dc:creator: @Tenacious_T Tenacious T
item.description:
@Tenacious_T wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 2) {
String name = command.substring(5);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.teleportToX = 2933;
c.teleportToY = 3285;
c.teleblock = true;
c.sendMessage(“You Have been thrown to JAIL!”);
c.sendMessage(“I would say sorry if I were you”);
c.teleblock = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
else if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 2) {
String name = command.substring(7);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.teleportToX = 3333;
c.teleportToY = 3333;
c.teleblock = false;
c.sendMessage(“Hope you have learned the Lesson!”);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

   }[/code]

There ya go man.

Read full topic

item.title: 5 errors
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

for my jail command i get five errors when i compile

the codes i have for jail/unjail are:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.teleToX = 2933;
		p.teleToY = 3285;
		p.action = 1;
                    p.sendMessage("You have been jailed by " + playerName);
		sendMessage("You have jailed "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
            }
        }

if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(7);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.resetPos();
     p.action = 0;
                    p.sendMessage(
                            "You have been unjailed by " + playerName);
     sendMessage("You have unjailed "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
            }

}[/code]

Read full topic
